note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Bookmarklet to print a Trello storyboard as index cards
body:
# Trello Cards Printable index cards for your [Trello](https://www.trello.com) project - Drag the trello-cards bookmarklet to your bookmarks bar - Run the bookmark from within trello board page. - Print on A4 in landscape mode, cut and and fold in half: - [Fork me on GitHub](https://github.com/kouphax/trello-cards")

Made by psd for Gov.UK and inspired by David.
name: Trello Cards
